post.description: Registers a new user by validating the phone number, code, and user details.

code.description: Verification code sent to the user

items.example: The phone number field is required.
The verification code must be exactly 6 digits.

post.description: Logs in a user by validating the phone number and password.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid phone number or password

message.example: Phone & Password do not match our record.

items.example: The phone number field is required.

post.description: Logs out the user by deleting their active Sanctum token.

401.description: Unauthorized - No active token found or invalid token

post.description: Allows a user to reset their password by providing their phone number, verification code, and new password

code.description: 6-digit verification code sent to the user's phone.

phone_number: The phone number field is required.
password: The password field must be at least 8 characters.
code: The code field must be a valid 6-digit number.

old_password.description: The current password of the user

new_password.description: The new password to set for the user

old_password.description: Validation errors for the old_password field

new_password.description: Validation errors for the new_password field

post.summary: Send a verification code to the phone number
post.description: Sends a verification code to the provided phone number either for registration or password recovery.

phone_number.description: The phone number to which the verification code will be sent. Must start with '09' and be 10 digits long.

status.description: Indicates whether the request was successful.

items.example: The phone number must start with '09' and be exactly 10 digits.

post.summary: Check if the verification code is valid
post.description: Validates the phone number and the verification code.

phone_number.description: The phone number to verify, must start with '09' and be 10 digits long.

code.description: The verification code consisting of exactly 6 digits.

status.description: Indicates whether the request was successful.

items.example: The phone number field is required.
The verification code must be exactly 6 digits.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all categories. Any authorized user can access this endpoint, regardless of their role.

get.summary: Get orders for a specific user
get.description: Retrieve orders for a specific user, optionally filtered by creation date. Only the authenticated user can access their own orders.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID of the user

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Sort orders by creation date (asc or desc)

post.summary: Create a new order for a user
post.description: Allows the authenticated user to create a new order with a list of products. The user must be authorized to place an order.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID of the user

requestBody.description: Request body for creating an order

get.summary: Get a specific order for the authenticated user
get.description: Retrieve a specific order of the authenticated user by order ID.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID of the user

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: ID of the order

get.summary: Get paginated sub-orders for a specific order
get.description: Retrieve paginated sub-orders of a specific order for the authenticated user with optional filtering by status.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID of the user

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: ID of the order

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter sub-orders by status (processing, shipped, delivered)

200.description: Paginated list of sub-orders for the order

401.description: Unauthorized to view sub-orders for this order

get.summary: Get details of a specific sub-order
get.description: Retrieve details of a specific sub-order for a specific order of the authenticated user.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID of the user

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: ID of the order

parameters.name: subOrder
parameters.description: ID of the sub-order

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated user's favourite products.

post.description: Add a product to the authenticated user's favourite list.

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: The ID of the product to be added to favourites

400.description: Product is already in the favourite list

message.example: Product is already in your favourite list

delete.description: Remove a product from the authenticated user's favourite list.

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: The ID of the product to be removed from favourites

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the product

422.description: Unprocessable Entity - Validation error for rate

get.summary: Retrieve a specific product by ID

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the product

get.summary: Retrieve a list of products with optional search and filtering

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by product names to filter products

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter options for products must from [best_selling,latest,top_rated,recommended]

200.description: List of products with additional user-specific information

current_page.description: Current page of the paginated results

first_page_url.description: URL for the first page of results

last_page_url.description: URL for the last page of results

next_page_url.description: URL for the next page of results

prev_page_url.description: URL for the previous page of results

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of promotion requests. Only accessible to admins.

parameters.name: accepted
parameters.description: Filter promotions by their acceptance status. Use 'true' for accepted requests and 'false' for pending requests.

200.description: List of promotion requests retrieved successfully.

403.description: Forbidden. User does not have the required admin role.

message.example: You do not have permission to perform this action.

post.description: Allows a user to send a promotion request to become a manager. Users can only send one request, and users with an existing manager role cannot send a request.

400.description: Invalid request due to one of the following reasons: the user already has a manager role, or a promotion request already exists.

message.example: you already have a manager role

post.summary: Promote a user to a Manager role
post.description: Allows an authorized admin to promote a user by accepting their promotion request.

parameters.name: promotion
parameters.description: ID of the promotion request

403.description: Forbidden. User does not have the required admin role.

message.example: You do not have permission to perform this action.

post.description: Rejects a promotion request by deleting it. Only accessible to admins.

parameters.name: promotion
parameters.description: ID of the promotion request to be rejected

403.description: Forbidden. User does not have the required admin role.

message.example: You do not have permission to perform this action.

delete.description: Remove a store from the user's list of favourites.

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: The ID of the store to remove from favourites

post.description: Add a store to the user's list of favourites.

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: The ID of the store to add to favourites

message.example: Store is already in your favourite list

get.description: Retrieve a list of the user's favourite stores.
Retrieve the list of categories for a given store. Accessible by any authorized user.

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the store

401.description: Unauthorized to access the store categories

put.description: Allows the store owner to update the categories associated with the store. The input must be an array of existing category IDs.

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the store

categories.description: Array of category IDs to associate with the store

message.example: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

get.summary: Get all contacts for a store
get.description: Retrieve all contacts associated with a specific store.

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the store

error.example: An error occurred while fetching the contacts

post.summary: Add a new contact to a store
post.description: Only the manager and owner of the store can add contacts. The store can have up to 5 contacts at most .

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the store

value.description: The contact value (e.g., phone number or email address)

message.example: You cannot add more than 5 contacts.

401.description: User is not authorized to add contacts

put.summary: Update a contact for a store
put.description: Only the manager and owner of the store can update a contact.

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the store

parameters.name: contact
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the contact

401.description: User is not authorized to update contacts

delete.summary: Delete a contact from a store
delete.description: Only the manager and owner of the store can delete a contact.

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the store

parameters.name: contact
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the contact

401.description: User is not authorized to delete contacts

get.summary: Get products for a specific store paginated
get.description: Fetch a list of products from a specific store, with an optional search filter.

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the store

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The search term to filter products by (optional)

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of products

401.description: Forbidden, the user is not authorized to create a product for this store

post.summary: Create a new product for a store
post.description: Create a new product within a specific store. The user must be a manager and the store owner. Validation for fields such as name, price, discount, quantity, and category is applied.

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the store

price.description: The price of the product (greater than 0)

discount.description: The discount on the product (between 0 and 100)

quantity.description: The available quantity of the product (min: 1)

expire_date.description: The expiration date of the product (optional)

category_id.description: The category ID the product belongs to (must exist in categories table)

401.description: Forbidden, the user is not authorized to create a product for this store

error.example: Failed to create product: Error message

post.description: Update the details of an existing product within a store. The user must be the store's manager and owner to update the product.

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the store

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the product

price.description: The price of the product (greater than 0)

discount.description: The discount on the product (between 0 and 100)

quantity.description: The available quantity of the product (min: 1)

expire_date.description: The expiration date of the product (optional)

category_id.description: The category ID the product belongs to (must exist in categories table)

401.description: Forbidden, the user is not authorized to update this product

404.description: Not found, the product does not exist

error.example: Failed to update product: Error message

get.summary: Get a paginated list of stores

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search query to filter stores by name

from.description: Index of the first store in the current page

active.description: Indicates if the page is active

to.description: Index of the last store in the current page

search.description: Validation errors for the search query

post.description: Create a new store if the user is a manager and does not already have a store.

401.description: Forbidden: User is not authorized to create a store or already has a store

get.description: Fetch the details of a specific store including its contacts, locations, and categories.

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the store

post.description: Update an existing store's details including optional photo upload.

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the store

401.description: Forbidden: User is not authorized to update this store

get.description: Retrieve the locations (name, longitude, and latitude) for a specific user.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID of the user

200.description: List of locations for the user

post.description: Allows the authenticated user to add locations with longitude, latitude, and name. A maximum of 5 locations can be added.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID of the user

put.description: Updates the details of the  user. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: User ID to update

photo.description: Photo of the user in jpg, jpeg, png, gif formats

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing token - not the same user

first_name: The first name field is required.

get.description: Retrieve a user by their ID. Only accessible by the user themselves or an admin.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID of the user

get.description: Retrieve users with optional filtering by role. Only accessible by admin.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Filter users by role

id.description: The unique identifier for the order

user_id.description: The ID of the user who placed the order

total.description: The total amount of the order

created_at.description: The timestamp when the order was created

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the order was last updated

id.description: The unique identifier for the product

store_id.description: The ID of the store the product belongs to

price.description: The price of the product in the smallest currency unit (e.g., cents)

quantity.description: The available quantity of the product

category_id.description: The ID of the category the product belongs to

expire_date.description: The expiration date of the product, if applicable

photo.description: The URL of the product's photo or image path

rate.description: The average rating of the product

sales.description: The total number of sales for the product

your_rate.description: The rating given by the authenticated user to this product, default is 0

your_favourite.description: Indicates whether the product is marked as a favourite by the authenticated user

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the product was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp of when the product was last updated

id.description: The unique identifier for the store

user_id.description: The ID of the user who owns the store

photo.description: URL or path to the store's photo

created_at.description: Timestamp when the store was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the store was last updated

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the store was soft deleted

id.description: The unique identifier for the contact

store_id.description: The ID of the store the contact belongs to

type.description: The type of contact (e.g., phone, email)

value.description: The contact value (e.g., phone number, email address)

created_at.description: Timestamp when the contact was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the contact was last updated

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the contact was soft deleted

id.description: The unique identifier for the location

photo.description: Profile photo URL or base64 encoded (optional)

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the user was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp of when the user was last updated

manager.description: Indicates if the user is a manager

admin.description: Indicates if the user is an admin

user.description: Indicates if the user is a regular user
